I am sorry to bother you again. mayde the error caused by in labelFile.py: <denchmark-code>def save(self, filename, shapes, imagePath, imageData, lineColor=None, fillColor=None): try: with open(filename, 'wb') as f: json.dump(dict( shapes=shapes, lineColor=lineColor, fillColor=fillColor, imagePath=imagePath, imageData=b64encode(imageData)), f, ensure_ascii=True, indent=2) except Exception as e: raise LabelFileError(e) </denchmark-code>
